name: Tangem
intro: Slim as a bank card, secure as a bank vault. Store, buy, earn, transfer and swap thousands of coins and tokens.
description: Tangem is redefining the wallet experience by delivering top-level security, simplicity and accessibility. Enjoy complete autonomy and independence while managing your assets with a single tap. Tangem Wallet breaks down barriers for crypto newcomers and enhances the custodial experience for advanced users.

name: Wow3
intro: Wow3 is a social NFT Portfolio Platform. Manage and showcase your NFT collection effortlessly. Connect, share, and discuss with others.
description: Empowering NFT enthusiasts, our app simplifies digital asset management. With advanced analytics and seamless integrations, we provide the tools to grow your collection efficiently.

name: Geckoterminal
intro: GeckoTerminal is a DeFi and DEX aggregator. Explore the market data & prices of any tokens traded across 110+ blockchain networks across 900+ DEXes – brought to you by the same team behind CoinGecko.
description: GeckoTerminal is a DeFi and DEX aggregator. Explore the market data & prices of any tokens traded across 110+ blockchain networks across 900+ DEXes – brought to you by the same team behind CoinGecko.

name: Coinex
intro: A very PoW-friendly exchange, with reasonable listing policies and enthusiasm for supporting young projects. CoinEx was founded in 2017, and at the heart of our mission lies a steadfast commitment to leveraging the transformative power of blockchain technology, guided by our “user first” brand ethos.
description: Our core team of CoinEx Ecosystem consists of members from global leading Internet and financial enterprises, including many of the earliest practitioners and investors in the cryptocurrency industry, demonstrating our technological expertise. The CoinEx Ecosystem is at the forefront of shaping the Web3 landscape, establishing key infrastructures that facilitate the circulation, application, and advancement of blockchain technology.

name: Dojima
intro: Dojima Network is an omnichain Layer 1 - A platform that seamlessly integrates the entire Web3 ecosystem onto one unified layer, empowering developers to craft groundbreaking applications. An omnichain blockchain aids in interoperability for dApps across multiple chains, helping transfer of assets and messages.
description: Dojima Network is an omnichain Layer 1 - A platform that seamlessly integrates the entire Web3 ecosystem onto one unified layer, empowering developers to craft groundbreaking applications. An omnichain blockchain aids in interoperability for dApps across multiple chains, helping transfer of assets and messages.
